title: Hi, anyone here has issues with outgoing video calls on WhatsApp with AirPods Pro, on Pixel 4a?
content:
Have tried reinstalling WhatsApp a few times, Bluetooth earphones (Airpods Pro) do not work with outgoing video calls on WhatsApp. Can't enable Bluetooth earphones during the video call.

Using Pixel 4a. Love the phone otherwise...

Can anyone help? Thanks
